properties.comment: Model parameter definition ========================== Model : Bearing Type : Example Parameters ---------- X0 [-] Static radial factor. Y0 [-] Static radial factor. X1 [-] Dynamic radial factor. Y1 [-] Dynamic radial factor. C0 [N] Static load factor. MeanDiameter [m] Mean diameter of the bearing LubricantViscosity [m2/s] Viscosity of the used lubricant ContactAngle [Â°] Contact angle of the rolling bodies LubricationFactor [-] Lubricant factor according to Harris p448
